roleset.name: to revoke a commission or authorization
roleset.note: DECOMMISSION-V NOTES: Frames file for 'decommission' based on survey of sentences in ectb2.No VerbNet entry. (from decommission.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: Passive
example.text: ...[The three older nuclear plants]-3 could be decommissioned *-3 early.
